title: PEP: Python Enhancement Proposals
shortDescription: Python's evolution is guided by PEPs - formal documents that propose new features!
detailedDescription: Python Enhancement Proposals (PEPs) are design documents that describe new features, processes, or changes to Python. Famous PEPs include PEP 8 (Style Guide), PEP 20 (Zen of Python), and PEP 484 (Type Hints). The PEP process ensures that changes to Python are well-documented and community-reviewed.
